title: Max Lawson: The Pandemic’s Billionaire Variant
itunes:title: Max Lawson: The Pandemic’s Billionaire Variant
description: Max Lawson, head of Oxfam International's Inequality Policy program, discusses Oxfam's latest inequality report, "Inequality Kills," which highlights the extreme growth in wealth of the billionaire class during the pandemic and how this has had a direct effect on the health and survival of the world's bottom 50%.
